title: New: Mmoths – All These Things (Feat. Holly Miranda)
body:
Having toured with The XX at the tail end of last year, Irish beat-making prodigy Mmoths will unveil his next EP in a matter of weeks.

This latest track featuring XL Records new singing Holly Miranda moves his sound even further away from the rigidity of electronic recordings and instead toward something more organic and fluid. Diaries, out 4 March brings a far more personal element to the music of Jack Colleran, not only marking him out as one of the most exciting young producers around, but also a hugely talented songwriter.
